GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 04-08N 006-57E AT 011040Z JUL.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO TO MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 081114Z JUL 18.
